bill.summary:
Supporting Children's Mental Health Care Access Act of 2022
This bill reauthorizes through FY2027 and makes changes to grants for states, localities, and Indian tribes to promote the integration of behavioral health in pediatric primary care through statewide or regional telehealth access programs.
Specific changes include allowing grant recipients to use funds to support schools and emergency departments.
